name: HarshWinds
description:
Harsh Winds is a fast paced local versus game With realistic sailing and weather mechanics in a detailed yet stylised visual style.

A game for 2 seafarers, where both take the helm of sailing ships in a fast paced skirmish where your skill at riding the winds will give you the upper hand in a fight!

Tips:
  • one other willing seafarer to fight against.
  • 2 Controllers / gamepads for best experience, however shared keyboard or combo can be used instead.
  • If you are a landlover with no prior sailing experience it is suggestible to look into tacking, a sailing technique used to travel up windnind.
  • A bottle of rum!

Coming Alpha changes:

  • larger maps
  • different game modes
  • different weapons/ability's
  • Voronoi split screen
  • more player number flexibility
